description: This file implements the NoteRepository class, which manages CRUD operations for notes within a local database, including handling tags associated with each note. It interacts with a SQLite database through helper classes and provides methods for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes, as well as managing tags.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class managing notes and tags in a local SQLite database, following singleton pattern.

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Retrieves a list of notes, optionally filtered by a query string matching the title or content.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided title, content, and tags; returns the new note's ID.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note's title, content, and tags by its ID.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note and associated tags by note ID.

methods.name: listTags
methods.description: Returns a list of all tags sorted alphabetically.

methods.name: getTagsForNote
methods.description: Retrieves tags associated with a specific note ID.

methods.name: setTagsForNote
methods.description: Sets tags for a given note, replacing existing tags.

methods.name: getOrCreateTagId
methods.description: Retrieves existing tag ID or creates a new tag, returning the ID.
